title: Quick Shoot Production from Sweet Potato

tasks.task: Cutting and preparing sweet potato roots for shoot production
subtasks: Collect three types of sweet potatoes (yellow, purple, and white varieties)
Prepare three plastic cups with tap water
Cleanly cut sweet potatoes into two sections using a knife
Use a toothpick to create three punctures in each cut end, inserted into the water
Maintain water level at least 1 cm deep in each cup
Position cups to ensure roots are submerged but not too deep
Wait 2 weeks for shoots to emerge
Monitor water levels daily and replenish as needed
Dip shoots into fresh water for root production
Allow shoots to root for 1 week
Transplant rooted shoots into desired growing medium or main field
